titleStmt.title: Answers for Æneas Mcleod town clerk of Edinburgh, to the petition presented by some particular persons, in name of the Council and Community of the said burgh, to his Grace His Majesties High Commissioner and the right honourable the Estates of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Mcleod, Æneas, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
